XIII.ii.3.A.1.d
.
Filing the Request for Preference for Public Housing
Do
not
add the request for, or a copy of, the certificate for preference for public housing to the claims folder.
title: M21-1, Part XIII, Subpart ii, Chapter 3, Section A - Certificate of Preference for Public Housing
citation: Part XIII, Subpart ii, Chapter 3, Section A
